name: Campus Culture [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Campus Culture is a 2D sidescroller game. You work in a college bookstore, but everything is not quite what it seems. Collect textbooks, snacks, and clothes while you deal with your snippety manager and increasingly creepy shifts. 

Follow for more upcoming games:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/fliesandcxbwebs

Insta - https://www.instagram.com/fliesxandxcobwebs

NEW Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/tynixgames
